⟩ Sauces & Seasonings ⟩

Easy Curry Paste

  • Vegetarian/Vegan

A quick basic curry paste

  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 thumb-sized piece root ginger, grated
  • 1 tsp chili powder
  • 1 tbsp paprika
  • 2 tsp garam masala
  • ½ tsp sea salt
  • 2 tbsp groundnut oil
  • 2 tbsp tomato puree
  • 1 tsp cumin
  • 1 tsp coriander seed, ground

Mix everything together

Fry it with the meat

Built with NYUM. Enjoy!
